properties.value: Mithril plateskirts give the fifth best stat bonuses of all plateskirts. This piece of armour can be made with Level 66 Smithing by using 3 mithril bars on an anvil, therefore granting the player with 150 smithing experience. At least 20 Defence is required to wear it. Mithril plateskirts have similar stats to mithril platelegs but weigh less.

Item ID1085

Mithril plateskirts give the fifth best stat bonuses of all plateskirts. This piece of armour can be made with Level 66 Smithing by using 3 mithril bars on an anvil, therefore granting the player with 150 smithing experience. At least 20 Defence is required to wear it. Mithril plateskirts have similar stats to mithril platelegs but weigh less.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-21-11
 Defence bonuses
+24+22+20-4+22
